trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around October 24th 2012
Summary: A light screamed across the sky during Greta Van Susterin Show on Fox
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 10:11 EST., 9:11 CST on the Greta Van Susteren show during an interview with Condleezza Rice, an object flew across the NY skyline. The object with a steady white light flew much faster than a jet would fly, and although it screeched across the the background quickly, it changed trajectory at least twice during the flight across the screen. No trail was visible. There were several other helicopters with blinking lights flying much slower to give perspective of the night sky during the interview. The show will repeat again at 1:00am est, 12:00midnight if anyone would like to take a look.
